WorkItem.Description:
I've just downloaded the latest version of Rawr v2.3.16 and everytime I launch Rawr.exe I get the following error:
 
Rawr.exe - .NET Framework Initialization Error
Unable to find a version of the runtime to run this application.
 
If I launch the prior version of Rawr v2.3.15, it works fine.
 
Any insight on what may be happening?  I'm runnning Windows 7 64 bit with all the latest patches installed.
 
Thanks,
 
Nonak
